name: Crisp Okra with Indian Pickle Spices. Achari Bhindi. Vegan Recipe.
description: Crisp Okra with Indian Pickle Spices. Achari Bhindi. A simple fun and super yummy crisp bhindi with pickle spices. Vegan and Gluten Free Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1.5 cups cut okra ((bhindi, smaller okra are better, the bigger ones have big seeds and are tough))
1/4 teaspoon chili flakes/chili powder or to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Dry roast the pickle spices on medium heat, stirring continuously for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Dry roast the pickle spices on medium heat, stirring continuously for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Grind and keep.( You can make a bigger batch of this spice mix and keep for 2-3 months! Toss chunky veggies with this spice mix for a quick side of vegetables!)
recipeInstructions.name: Grind and keep.( You can make a bigger batch of this spice mix and keep for 2-3 months! Toss chunky veggies with this spice mix for a quick side of vegetables!)

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, add oil, heat at low-medium heat and spread oil all over the pan.
recipeInstructions.name: In a pan, add oil, heat at low-medium heat and spread oil all over the pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Drop in the cut okra. The pan should be big enough to accommodate the cut okra without much overlap.
recipeInstructions.name: Drop in the cut okra. The pan should be big enough to accommodate the cut okra without much overlap.

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle the salt, chili and desired quantity of pickle spice mix on the okra to evenly top all pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle the salt, chili and desired quantity of pickle spice mix on the okra to evenly top all pieces.

recipeInstructions.text: Reduce heat and mix well, and cook for another 10-15 minutes, partially covered, on Low heat till desired crispiness is achieved
recipeInstructions.name: Reduce heat and mix well, and cook for another 10-15 minutes, partially covered, on Low heat till desired crispiness is achieved

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot as side with any Indian meal (flat bread, lentil soup) or top any rice dish or eat as you like it.! Simple and yummy(according to hubbs)!!:)
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot as side with any Indian meal (flat bread, lentil soup) or top any rice dish or eat as you like it.! Simple and yummy(according to hubbs)!!:)

keywords: easy recipe, okra side dish recipe, spiced okra
